pack.chrysalis.asset_backports.name: Asset Backports
pack.chrysalis.no_carved_pumpkin_overlay: Removes the overlay of carved pumpkins
item.chrysalis.fill_hunger.description: Sets User to Maximum Hunger Value
item.chrysalis.fill_oxygen.description: Sets User to Maximum Oxygen Value
item.chrysalis.key.description: A generic key item used as a fallback for all unlockable blocks.
item.chrysalis.admin_key.description: A key item that can be used to unlock any unlockable block.
item.chrysalis.test_right_click_item.des: An item for testing right-click functionality. Only meant for debug environments!
block.chrysalis.barricade.description: A block that can be used to block off areas and deflect projectiles off of it.
block.chrysalis.barricade.description_se: Can be interacted with any block to disguise itself as said block.
block.chrysalis.placeholder_block.descri: A block that can be set to a specific block state (existing or not), and can be updated to said block state as long as it is registered.
effect.chrysalis.radiance.desc: Shrouds the player's screen in a blinding light.
effect.minecraft.health_boost.desc: Increases the maximum amount of health.
effect.chrysalis.health_reduction.desc: Decreases the maximum amount of health.
effect.chrysalis.building_fatigue.desc: Prevents players and endermen from building.
effect.chrysalis.heaviness.desc: Causes the target to fall at a faster speed, which deals extra fall damage.
effect.chrysalis.wounded.desc: Causes the target to take bonus damage if they are not at full health.
effect.chrysalis.electrocuted.desc: Causes the target to take damage as they move or come into contact with water.
effect.chrysalis.arthropod_sight.desc: Transforms the player's vision into the vision of an arthropod.
effect.chrysalis.blind_sight.desc: Transforms the player's vision into the vision of a blind mob.
effect.chrysalis.creeper_sight.desc: Transforms the player's vision into the vision of a Creeper.
effect.chrysalis.ender_sight.desc: Transforms the player's vision into the vision of an Enderman.
effect.chrysalis.resin_sight.desc: Transforms the player's vision into the vision of a Creaking.
effect.chrysalis.skeletal_sight.desc: Transforms the player's vision into the vision of a Skeleton.
effect.chrysalis.zombie_sight.desc: Transforms the player's vision into the vision of a Zombie.

gui.chrysalis.config_category.generic.de: Configure the way various mechanics function in this mod.
gui.chrysalis.config_category.vanilla_mo: Configure the way vanilla mobs function in this mod.
gui.chrysalis.config_category.mod_mobs.d: Configure the way mobs added by this mod function.
gui.chrysalis.config_category.mobs.descr: Configure the way various mobs function in this mod.
gui.chrysalis.config_category.blocks_and: Configure the way various blocks and items function in this mod.
gui.chrysalis.config_category.blocks.des: Configure the way various blocks function in this mod.
gui.chrysalis.config_category.items.desc: Configure the way various items function in this mod.
gui.chrysalis.config_category.potions.de: Enable or disable various potions from being able to be brewed.
gui.chrysalis.config_category.armor.desc: Configure the way various armor items function in this mod.
gui.chrysalis.config_category.enchantmen: Enable or disable various enchantments from being obtainable.
gui.chrysalis.config_category.miscellane: Miscellaneous configurable options that don't fit into any other listed categories.
gui.chrysalis.config_category.experiment: Experimental options for a bit more intrusive mechanics.
chrysalis.configuration.title: Chrysalis Config
chrysalis.configuration.item_dropping_so: Dropping an item will play a popping sound.
chrysalis.configuration.screenshot_sound: Taking a screenshot will play a camera sound.
chrysalis.configuration.spawn_egg_use_so: Spawning an entity with a spawn egg will play an egg cracking sound.
chrysalis.configuration.creative_mode_it: Deleting items in creative mode will play a trash crumbling sound.
chrysalis.configuration.reworked_mob_gri: Passive world interactions from mobs, such as villagers collecting crops or allays picking up items, are now determined by the mobWorldInteractions game rule instead of the mobGriefing game rule. Bosses now have their own unique game rules for griefing.
chrysalis.configuration.telegraphed_zomb: If a zombie villager has any blocks near it that speed up its curing process, such as iron bars or beds, it will emit green sparkle particles.
chrysalis.configuration.improved_structu: Structure voids now render similarly to barriers, and now utilize a full hitbox.
chrysalis.configuration.improved_glass_r: Glass and glass pane blocks no longer occlude blocks of the same classification while next to each other.
chrysalis.configuration.improved_grate_r: Grate blocks no longer occlude blocks of the same classification while next to each other.
chrysalis.configuration.change_default_v: Vaults placed in creative mode now require the generic key item instead of specifically trial keys. Requires restarting!
chrysalis.configuration.fixed_elytra_mod: Elytra no longer have stretched uvs on their sides.
chrysalis.configuration.mob_head_shaders: Wearing a mob head will now display the specific mob's spectator mode shader.
Wearing a carved pumpkin or a mob head will hide your name tag from other players.
chrysalis.configuration.reworked_tooltip: Reworks the layout of a number of tooltips to appear cleaner and easier to read.
chrysalis.configuration.chrysalis_toolti: All new items added by chrysalis will display a tooltip with the mod's name on them.
chrysalis.configuration.chrysalis_creati: All new items added by chrysalis will be given their own creative mode tab. Requires restarting!
chrysalis.configuration.experimental_wor: Whether or not to show a warning message when creating or entering a world with experimental settings.
gamerule.chrysalis:mobWorldInteractions: Allow non-destructive world interactions from mobs
gamerule.chrysalis:dragonGriefing: Allow for Ender Dragons to destroy blocks
gamerule.chrysalis:witherGriefing: Allow for Withers to destroy blocks
gamerule.chrysalis:destroyItemsInExplosi: In explosions, most items will be destroyed
Most items caught in explosions are lost in the explosion.
gamerule.chrysalis:playerDeathItemDespaw: Items dropped by dead players will despawn after a short period of time.
gamerule.chrysalis:sendDebugUtilityFeedb: Debug utility items will display a message in the chat when used.
gamerule.chrysalis:bedsExplode.descripti: Beds will explode when used in any dimension outside of the Overworld.
gamerule.chrysalis:respawnAnchorsExplode: Respawn Anchors will explode when used in any dimension outside of the Nether.
tag.block.chrysalis.mineable.sword_does_: Mineable With Swords (Does Not Drop Block)
tag.entity_type.chrysalis.does_not_flip_: Does Not Flip Over Upon Death
item.chrysalis.bundle.empty.description: Can hold a mixed stack of items
comment.chrysalis.shared_features.nether: SHARED FEATURES - NETHERITE HORSE ARMOR BACKPORT
